thread.title: Inflation picks up to 2.7 pct in January
thread.title_full: Inflation picks up to 2.7 pct in January

author: ABS-CBN News
title: Inflation picks up to 2.7 pct in January
text:
Inflation picks up to 2.7 pct in January ABS-CBN News Posted at Feb 07 2017 09:31 AM | Updated as of Feb 07 2017 10:13 AM 
Share Facebook 
MANILA – Inflation picked up in January, due to higher fuel, electricity and water costs, the Philippine Statistics Authority said Tuesday. 
The consumer price index rose 2.7 percent in January compared to a 2.6-percent rise in December and 1.3 percent during the same period in 2016. 
Analysts polled by Reuters had predicted January inflation at 2.8 percent, within the central bank’s 2.3 percent to 3.3 percent target. 
Share
